Package org.forgerock.openidm.filter

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JsonValueFilterVisitor
    Filters JsonValue objects and then returns Boolean for the test result.
    MutableFilterDecorator
    A CREST Filter decorator that allows the decorated implementation (delegate) to be changed at runtime.
    PassthroughFilter
    Passthrough filter forwards all requests to the next handler unchanged.
    ScriptedFilter
    A router filter that allows hook on each CRUDPAQ operation at the following invocation points: onRequest - before the request has been handled onResponse - after the request invocation has completed successfully and a response is available onFailure - after the request invocation has completed with an exception
    ServiceUnavailableFilter
    A filter that returns a Service Unavailable message for all requests.
